responses.return: The product return policy guarantees free refund within 30 days for each item purchased.
responses.deliver: The company delivers orders free of charge whenever customers spend more than $50. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days.
responses.discount: We have seasonal discounts! View our website to find the current offers!
responses.availability: Please specify the product name so I can check its stock.
responses.price: Our prices are competitive. I need to know which particular product you want information about.
responses.payment: The business accepts payment through major credit cards along with PayPal and Apple Pay for customer convenience.
responses.help: I'm here to help! Feel free to ask about our products, shipping, returns, or anything else.
responses.store: We have physical stores in major cities and an online store available 24/7.
responses.warranty: Our products come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

tshirt.default: We have a wide range of t-shirts available in various sizes, colors, and materials.

size.small: Small t-shirts are available in red, blue, and black.
size.medium: Medium t-shirts come in red, blue, black, and white.
size.large: Large t-shirts are available in blue and black.
size.xlarge: Extra large t-shirts are available in two colors: black and white.

color.red: Our red t-shirts are popular in both small and medium sizes.
color.blue: Blue t-shirts are offered in small, medium, and large sizes.
color.black: Black t-shirts are a bestseller and available in all sizes.
color.white: White t-shirts are available in medium and extra large sizes.

material.cotton: Our t-shirts are 100% cotton â€“ soft, and comfortable!
material.polyester: We offer polyester t-shirts for a lighter option.

price.default: Our t-shirts range from $19.99 to $29.99 depending on style and material.
price.cotton: Cotton t-shirts are priced at $24.99 each, with discounts for big purchases.
price.polyester: Polyester t-shirts are available for $19.99, our most affordable option.

jeans.default: We offer various jeans in different sizes, styles, and materials.

size.30: Size 30 jeans are available in slim and regular fits.
size.32: Size 32 jeans come in slim, regular, and relaxed fits.
size.34: Size 34 jeans are available in regular and relaxed fits.
size.36: Size 36 jeans are offered only in a relaxed fit.

style.slim: Slim fit jeans are available in sizes 30 and 32.
style.regular: Regular fit jeans are available in sizes 30, 32, and 34.
style.relaxed: Relaxed fit jeans are available in sizes 32, 34, and 36.

material.denim: Our jeans are made from high-quality denim, ensuring durability and comfort.
material.stretch: Our stretch jeans contain 5% elastane for extra comfort and flexibility.

price.default: Our jeans range from $39.99 to $59.99 depending on style and material.
price.slim: Slim fit jeans are priced at $49.99, offering modern style and comfort.
price.regular: Regular fit jeans are available for $44.99, our most popular option.
price.relaxed: Relaxed fit jeans are priced at $39.99, perfect for everyday comfort.

color.blue: Our blue jeans come in various shades from light to dark.
color.black: Black jeans are available in all fits.
color.gray: Gray jeans are available in slim and regular fits only.

jacket.default: We offer stylish jackets for all seasons in various designs and materials.

size.small: Small jackets fit chest sizes 36-38 inches and are available in most styles.
size.medium: Medium jackets fit chest sizes 40-42 inches and are our most popular size.
size.large: Large jackets fit chest sizes 44-46 inches and come in all available colors.
size.xlarge: XL jackets fit chest sizes 48-50 inches and are available in selected styles.

material.leather: Our leather jackets are made from premium leather for durability.
material.denim: Denim jackets are lightweight and perfect for spring and fall.
material.cotton: Cotton jackets offer breathability and comfort for mild weather.

style.bomber: Bomber jackets feature a ribbed waistband and cuffs with a front zipper closure.
style.trucker: Trucker jackets have a classic button front with multiple pockets.
style.parka: Parkas are longer with a hood and insulation for colder weather.

price.default: Our jackets range from $69.99 to $199.99 depending on material and style.
price.leather: Leather jackets are our premium option at $199.99.
price.denim: Denim jackets are priced affordably at $69.99.

color.black: Black jackets are available in all materials and styles.
color.brown: Brown jackets are available in leather.
color.blue: Blue jackets are popular in denim and cotton materials.

sweater.default: We offer cozy sweaters perfect for layering in colder months.

size.small: Small sweaters fit sizes 36-38 and are available in most colors.
size.medium: Medium sweaters fit sizes 40-42 and are our best-selling size.
size.large: Large sweaters fit sizes 44-46 and offer a comfortable relaxed fit.
size.xlarge: XL sweaters fit sizes 48-50 and are available in selected designs.

material.wool: Our wool sweaters are warm, naturally insulating, and perfect for winter.
material.cotton: Cotton sweaters are lightweight and ideal for milder temperatures.
material.cashmere: Cashmere sweaters are our luxurious option - incredibly soft and warm.

style.crewneck: Crewneck sweaters have a round neckline.
style.v-neck: V-neck sweaters feature a V-shaped neckline for a more formal appearance.
style.cardigan: Cardigans have front buttons and are perfect for versatile layering.

price.default: Our sweaters range from $39.99 to $129.99 depending on material.
price.wool: Wool sweaters are priced at $59.99, offering warmth and durability.
price.cotton: Cotton sweaters are our most affordable option at $39.99.
price.cashmere: Cashmere sweaters are premium quality at $129.99.

color.gray: Gray sweaters are versatile and available in all materials.
color.navy: Navy sweaters offer a classic color that pairs well with most outfits.
color.cream: Cream sweaters have a timeless look and are especially popular in wool and cashmere.

shoes.default: We offer a variety of shoes in different sizes, colors, and materials.

size.small: Small shoes are available in sizes 36-38 EU.
size.medium: Medium shoes are available in sizes 39-41 EU.
size.large: Large shoes are available in sizes 42-44 EU.
size.xlarge: Extra large shoes are available in sizes 45-47 EU.

color.black: Black shoes are available in all sizes and styles.
color.white: White shoes are popular for both casual and formal wear.
color.blue: Blue shoes are available in select styles.

material.leather: Our leather shoes are durable and stylish.
material.canvas: Canvas shoes are lightweight and perfect for everyday use.

style.sneaker: Sneakers are available in various colors and sizes.
style.loafer: Loafers offer a classic look for formal occasions.
style.boot: Boots are available for both men and women.

price.default: Our shoes range from $49.99 to $149.99 depending on style and material.
